TopicTitle: Contracts Disappearing using Flight Manager Reuseabiliy Mod

Articles.Content: Hi, I am having a problem with all active contracts disappearing as well as the record of all past contracts disappearing. The contracts window starts offering me the basic contracts. I have installed contracts manager for historical contracts, but I only noticed the problem after installing the reliability manager and associated mods. It would be a shame to have to uninstall these because I really enjoy having the ability to fly discarded stages while still in the atmosphere. It makes the game so much better. Any ideas how to solve or negate this issue?
